meanings.definition: A dish of rice cooked with meat, fish, or vegetables and flavored with saffron or turmeric.
meanings.sent1: The birianis at the party were delicious and aromatic.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes birianis every Sunday for our family dinner.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled birianis on my shirt, and now it smells amazing!
meanings.sent4: The birianis on the table were a colorful masterpiece of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of birianis cooking filled the entire house with warmth.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing or eating birianis.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy the birianis more than the actual meal preparation.
meanings.sent2: The birianis event at the restaurant was a huge success.
meanings.sent3: We had a birianis competition to see who could cook the best dish.
meanings.sent4: The joy of birianis is in the shared experience of eating together.
meanings.sent5: The anticipation of tasting the birianis made everyone excited.
